Name: zho-anonymousgroupo-lad
Author: Anonymous Group Of Translators
Source: Goodword Books , http://www.goodwordbooks.com/ , Center for Peace and Spirituality , https://www.cpsglobal.org/

Translations.Text: Xìndào de rénmen a! Nǐmen de cáichǎn hé zǐnǚ, bùyào shǐ nǐmen hūlüè 418	dì liùsì zhāng xiāng qī (tái áng bo ní) le jìniàn zhēnzhǔ. Shéi nàyàng zuò, shéi shì kuī shé de

Zài sǐwáng jiànglín zhīqián, nǐmen dāngfēn shě wǒ cìyǔ nǐmen de, fǒuzé, jiānglái rén rén shuō:“Wǒ de zhǔ a! Nǐ wèihé bù ràng wǒ yánchí dào yīgè línjìn de dìngqí, yǐbiàn wǒ yǒu suǒ shīshě, ér chéngwéi shànrén ne?”
Dàn shòu xiàn yī dào, zhēnzhǔ jué bù ràng rènhé rén yánchí, zhēnzhǔ shì chè zhī nǐmen de xíngwéi de
